author: gstein
msg: Small fix to prevent an exception from being thrown on bad input.
- wrap a conversion to an integer with a try/except. if the argument is
not an integer, then they goofed -- display the usage.

author: brane
msg: Add xdelta algorithm, and use it by default.

author: maxb
msg: Fix the --with-berkeley-db configure option to not imply that you can pass a
path to a Berkeley DB installation independent of what APR-UTIL is doing.
You can't - we dropped support for that in r7560.

author: brane
msg: Tweak the BDB 4.3 support a bit, and make it work on Windows, where
(SVN_BDB_DB_BUFFER_SMALL): Change definition to follow the style of
* subversion/libsvn_fs_base/fs.c: Use the new bdb_error_gatherer and
SVN_BDB_ERROR_GATHERER_IGNORE macros instead of a bunch of ifdefs.
